mapper.select: select rn, noticeNo, theaterNo, theatername, homepage, content, regDate from (select rownum rn, noticeNo, theaterNo, theatername, homepage, content, regDate from (select notice_no noticeNo, n.theater_no theaterNo, theatername, homepage, content, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') regDate from notice n, theater t where n.theater_no= t.theater_no order by theaterNo desc, regDate desc)) where rn between #{startRnum} and #{endRnum}

select notice_no noticeNo, n.theater_no theaterNo, theatername, homepage, content, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') regDate from notice n, theater t where n.theater_no= t.theater_no order by theaterNo desc, regDate desc

select notice_no noticeNo, n.theater_no theaterNo, theatername, content, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') regDate from notice n, theater t where n.theater_no= t.theater_no and notice_no= #{noticeNo}
